attributes.action: Increase wages of British Service Men and Women in all Forces
attributes.additional_details: This petition is to increase the wages of service men and women in our armed forces. I think that it is disgraceful how much these men and women get paid for the service they do to their country. We would like the wage for a New Entrant to rise to £15,500 and the rates for a Private Level 1 to rise to £18,500 and all other ranks wage to rise by £2200. I would like this to be achieved by 2020.
